Retrieves all ArcPT (Place to Transition arcs) in the PetriNet.
getArcsPT() - Method in class main.PetriNet
Retrieves all ArcPT arcs in the PetriNet by iterating over each Transition and collecting its incoming arcs.
getArcsPT() - Method in class main.Transition
Retrieves the list of ArcPT objects (incoming arcs) associated with this Transition.

Retrieves all ArcTP (Transition to Place arcs) in the PetriNet.

Retrieves all ArcTP arcs in the PetriNet by iterating over each Transition and collecting its outgoing arcs.
